titles.title: Expressing support for blockchain technology and digital assets.
Expressing support for blockchain technology and digital assets.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Innovation, Data, and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that (1) the United States should seek to prioritize the potential opportunities of technology and digital assets, and (2) Congress should enact a functional framework tailored to the specific risks of different digital asset-related activities.
